price: 17. Gloire soit donc rendue à Allah, à la nuit tombante et au point du jour !
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
